import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Header from '/Users/shreyaprasad/Desktop/Coding /WebDev /planner/client/src/components/common/heading/Header.jsx' import './studentsignup.css' import Validation from './SignupValidation' import axios from 'axios' const StudentSignup = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ fname: '', lname: '', srn: '', email: '', password: '', repassword: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate(); const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) const handleInput = (event) => { setValues(prev => ({...prev,[event.target.name]:[event.target.value]})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (errors.fname === "" && errors.lname === "" && errors.srn === "" && errors.email === "" && errors.password === "" && errors.repassword === ""){ axios.post('http://localhost:3000/signup/student', values) .then(res => { navigate('student/profile') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } } return (
